ygData.subject: Re: Gigantic Zweihander - Also John..
ygData.msgSnippet: yah, but no luck with a GZ :( (see previous post) ... From: Mifsud, Michael  So did you kill him brother? ... Give back to your
ygData.messageBody:
yah, but no luck with a GZ :(

(see previous post)

>>> "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...> 5.24.99 9:51:57 PM >>>
From: "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...>

So did you kill him brother?

> ----------
> From: Jason Coan[SMTP:COANJ@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Sent: Saturday, May 22, 1999 12:13 AM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Gigantic Zweihander - Also John..
>
> From: "Jason Coan" <COANJ@...>
>
> btw, Karg is going to die this weekend......and I'll make sure its a slow
> and painfull death!!
>
> Salr D'Taynkk
> Dark Warrior of The Kith
> Soon to be weilding a really nice GZ
> Veeshan
>
> >>> "Jones, Brian" <brian.jones@...> 5.21.99 7:34:30 AM >>>
> From: "Jones, Brian" <brian.jones@...>
>
> You filthy dark elf, stay out of me homeland! Karg is a local hero
> and you shouldn't be messing with him. You may get Tundra Jack
> and Iceberg in the deal if you know what I mean. Watch your slimmy
> back!
>
>
> Angarth, Clan Anstruther, Warrior of the 15th Tier
> "Periissem ni periisem"
>
> *spoiler below*
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
> OOC - His name is Karg Icebear and he roams the frozen plains
> of Everfrost. I see him every so often by Tundra Jacks Tower on the
> Northside of the plains. Last time I saw him he was just wearing a
> kilt, so I don't know if he just was killed or what.
>
> > ----------
> > From: Nick Morgowicz[SMTP:nomorgow@...]
> > Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > Sent: Friday, May 21, 1999 6:43 AM
> > To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > Subject: [warriors_eq] Gigantic Zweihander - Also John..
> >
> > From: Nick Morgowicz <nomorgow@...>
> >
> > Heya, i just saw this latest addition to gameznet and it looked very
> > interesting. With 18dmg, 39 delay, and glowing like a greater
> > lighstone, this two handed sword is calling to be my replacement for the
> > AGI stealing BBC. Thing is though, the website only said it would be
> > found on a roaming barbarian in everfrost. Does anyone know which
> > barbarian has it? My drow warrior is already KOS there, so it's no big
> > deal if i kill a few barbarians :)
> >
> > To John - I didn't catch you on last eve. Hopefully tonight after work
> > we can get together and share stories. I was in Guk and Cazic but I'll
> > go anywhere really :)
> >
> > Nick
